title: looking for 2 people joining team
body:
i am the leader of the team but i dont care who joins im currently bornze 3 and have a silver 5 in my team mid jg are taken but we switch roles nearly every game looking for chilled people 
must have
skype
not being a rager
good sportsmanship win or lose 
any division is fine 
hit me up if your interested my name is SilentVile

replies.body:
You can add me, i never tried team before.
IGN: JuicyCupcake
Silver 1, can fill any role.

Hey man, would love to play with a team that takes it seriously, i am currently silver 3 and have a good attitude to not give up and not a rager.
I play adc but am happy to play anywhere :)

Hey bro, My name is Axel, 22, Looking for fun team mates too. Good teammate, prefer Jungle but can play supp and top pretty well. poor performance at ADC. I have Skype and Curse. Keen to play even if you don't want to play in a ranked team my friend

hi, my name Tyson, I have no idea what role I can play good, but I usually play mid
I got 2 account,1 is bronze 1 and another is unrank
Hope I can play with you. Add me if you want :D "Nervy"

Hey, I've been wanting to play ranked, but I've put off playing it, apart from the seeding games for so long I think I need to just play some and see how it goes. I prefer top and sup, I'm Silver V, but I barely play ranked. Would love to try being in a team and seeing how it goes. Add me if you want:Major Armstrong.

Hi my name is David,im 16!
im a great team player and good listener and im willing to improve. im a league player that wants to play in front of a roaring crowd one day.
i main adc- im very good with the following champions in this role,trist-cait-jinx-kog-corki and graves and kalista.
looking for a team, that is willing to play serious and take this as a life goal. so hit me up if your looking for an adc  and you are wanting to "go pro"
